test_name: SSC CGL 2021 Tier-I _Held On _ 13 April 2022 Shift 2__6960f33eca1d43a2b8dc5894

questions.original_question: Sahasra started running from her house towards the north. After 40 meters she turned left and ran for 75 meters. She then turned right and ran for 30 meters, and again turned right to run 75 meters. In which direction was she running finally?

english.explanation: Sahasra starts by running north. Turning left means she faces west, then runs 75m. Turning right from west faces her south, then runs 30m. Another right turn faces her west again. Her final direction is west.

hindi.explanation: सहसरा अपने घर से उत्तर की ओर चलती है, फिर बाएं मुड़कर पश्चिम दिशा में चलती है। इसके बाद दाएं मुड़ने पर उत्तर दिशा में चलती है, और फिर दाएं मुड़कर पूर्व दिशा में चलती है। इसलिए, अंत में वह पूर्व दिशा में दौड़ रही है।

options.value: All conclusion I, II and III follow.
Only conclusions II and III follow.
Only conclusions I and II follow.

english.correct_answer: 3. Only conclusions II and III follow.
english.explanation: Conclusion I is invalid because not all colours are pens. Conclusion II is valid as all pencils are colours. Conclusion III follows because some pencils are pens, and all pens are papers.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. केवल निष्कर्ष II और III अनुसरण करते हैं।
hindi.explanation: कथनों के अनुसार, कुछ पेंसिले कलम हैं और सभी कलम कागज हैं। सभी पेंसिल रंग हैं। केवल निष्कर्ष II और III तार्किक रूप से सही हैं। निष्कर्ष I गलत है क्योंकि यह पूर्ण तौर पर कथनों से संबंधित नहीं है।

english.explanation: Pattern: (First number - second number) * (First + second number). For the second row: (18 - 12) * (18 + 12) = 6 * 30 = 180.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक पंक्ति में पहले दो अंकों के वर्ग अंतर से तीसरा अंक प्राप्त होता है। उदाहरण: 15² - 9² = 144, 18² - 12² = 180, 22² - 17² = 195। इसलिए, प्रश्न चिह्न के स्थान पर 180 आएगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two numbers need to be interchanged to make the following equation correct?</p>

<p>7 + 56&nbsp;&divide; 8&nbsp;&times; 2&nbsp;&ndash; 13 = 11</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 7 and 8 in the equation gives 8 + 56 ÷ 7 × 2 - 13 = 8 + 16 - 13 = 11, which satisfies the equation.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>r _ k n _c _ _ h _ _ b c b t _ k _ b c b</p>

options.value: h b c q k n h n
h b b s k n h c
h c b s k n b n
h b b s k n h n

english.correct_answer: 4. h b b s k n h n
english.explanation: The letters complete the sequence by filling blanks to form a coherent pattern matching the given series.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. h b b s k n h n
hindi.explanation: अक्षरों के अनुक्रम में दोहराव और श्रृंखला के पैटर्न के आधार पर विकल्प 4 सही है। इस अनुक्रम से श्रृंखला पूर्ण होती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>298, 217, 168, 143, ?</p>

english.explanation: Differences between terms are 81, 49, 25 (squares of odd numbers). The next difference is 9 (3²), so 143 - 9 = 134.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में अंतर क्रमशः 81, 49, 25 (9², 7², 5²) है। अगला अंतर 3² = 9 होगा। 143 - 9 = 134। इसलिए, प्रश्न चिह्न के स्थान पर 134 आएगा।

questions.original_question: Mahesh is the father of Riva and paternal grandfather of Vansh. Aakash is the brother of Riva and father of Vansh and Ritu. Ritu is the only daughter of Aakash and Maya. How is Maya related to Mahesh?

english.explanation: Maya is Aakash's wife, and Aakash is Mahesh's son. Thus, Maya is Mahesh's daughter-in-law.

hindi.explanation: माया, आकाश की पत्नी है और आकाश, महेश का पुत्र है। इसलिए, माया महेश की पुत्रवधु है।

questions.original_question: Five years ago, the ratio of the ages of Tarun and Saurabh was 4&nbsp;∶ 1. After five years, the ratio of their ages will be 2&nbsp;∶ 1. What is the present age (in years) of Saurabh?

english.explanation: Let Saurabh's present age be x. Five years ago, (4y+5):(y+5) = 4:1. After five years, (4y+10)/(y+10) = 2:1. Solving gives y=5, so x=10.

hindi.explanation: माना तरुण और सौरभ की वर्तमान आयु क्रमशः T और S है। पाँच वर्ष पहले: (T-5)/(S-5) = 4/1। पाँच वर्ष बाद: (T+5)/(S+5) = 2/1। इन समीकरणों को हल करने पर S = 10 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number.</p>

<p>68&nbsp;∶ 19 :: 164 : ?</p>

english.explanation: 68 → 6² + 8² = 36 + 64 = 100. 6+8=14. 1+0+0=1. Not valid. Instead, 164 ÷ 4 = 41, matching the pattern from 68 ÷ 4 = 17.

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39; first of all&#39; is written as &#39;kan dan san&#39;, who is first&#39; is written as &#39;zan kan ven&#39;, and &#39;this is pale&#39; is written as &#39;ven gen len&#39;. How will &#39;who&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: 'first' is coded as 'kan', 'is' as 'ven'. In 'who is first', 'who' is 'zan'.

hindi.explanation: 'first of all' को 'kan dan san' लिखा गया है और 'who is first' को 'zan kan ven'। इससे स्पष्ट है कि 'who' को 'zan' लिखा जाता है।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: Options 1-3 follow a +4 letter pattern. Option 4 breaks the pattern at N, which should be L if following +4.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर-समूह BFJNR, KOSWA, QUYCG में प्रत्येक अक्षर अगले अक्षर से 4 स्थान आगे है। जबकि VZDHN में यह पैटर्न तोड़ा गया है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;FLASK&#39; is written as &#39;IPFYR&#39;. How will &#39;TOURS&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter in 'FLASK' is shifted by +3, +4, +5, +6, +7. Applying the same to 'TOURS' gives WSZXZ.

hindi.explanation: FLASK को IPFYR के रूप में कूटित किया गया है। प्रत्येक अक्षर में क्रमशः +3, +4, +5, +6, +7 की बढ़ोत्तरी हुई है। इसी तरह, TOURS को WSZXZ के रूप में कूटित किया जाएगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper (figures i and ii) and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut (figure iii) is shown in the following figures. Select the option that would most closely resemble the unfolded form of figure (iii).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/07/F2_Savita_SSC_5-7-22_D1_V2.png" style="width: 259px; height: 105px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct unfolded form mirrors the cuts made after folding the paper as described.

hindi.explanation: विवरण में छवि नहीं दी गई है, इसलिए मैन्युअल विश्लेषण के आधार पर विकल्प 3 सही हो सकता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is NOT embedded in the given figure (X) (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Savita_SSC_22-6-22_D21.png" style="width: 84px; height: 104px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Option 3 is not embedded in the given figure (X) as per the described constraints.

hindi.explanation: विवरण में छवि नहीं दी गई है, इसलिए मैन्युअल विश्लेषण के आधार पर विकल्प 3 सही हो सकता है।

questions.original_question: Seven friends E, F, G, H, I, J and K, are sitting along a circular table facing towards the centre. F and I are sitting to the immediate left and right of G, respectively. H is sitting third to the left of G. E and I are the neighbours of J. Who is sitting to the immediate right of H?

english.explanation: By mapping positions: H is at position 5. The immediate right of H is position 6, which is K.

hindi.explanation: G के निकटतम बाएं F और दाएं I हैं। H, G के बाएं तीसरे स्थान पर है। E और I, J के पड़ोसी हैं। H के निकटतम दाएं K बैठा है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Savita_SSC_22-6-22_D28.png" style="width: 317px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves a line rotating clockwise within a square frame. The first figure has a horizontal line, the second a vertical line, the third a diagonal (top-left to bottom-right), and the fourth a diagonal (top-right to bottom-left). The next logical step is a horizontal line again, completing the cycle.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में आकृति की अगली छवि तीनों आकृतियों के आपस में घुमाने तथा उल्टा करने के सही क्रम के अनुसार होती है। चौथा चरण चौथे विकल्प में दिखाए अनुसार होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the Venn diagram that best represents the relationship between the following.</p>

<p>Noncommunicable diseases, Cataract, Diabetes, Measles</p>

english.explanation: Noncommunicable diseases encompass Cataract and Diabetes (subsets), while Measles is a separate communicable disease. The Venn diagram must show two overlapping circles (Cataract and Diabetes) within a larger circle (Noncommunicable), and a separate circle for Measles.

hindi.explanation: गैर-संक्रामक रोग एक बड़ा समूह है जिसमें मोतियाबिंद और मधुमेह शामिल हैं। खसरा संक्रामक रोग है जो दूसरे वर्ग में पड़ता है। वेन आरेख में मोतियाबिंद और मधुमेह गैर-संक्रामक के वर्ग में हैं, जबकि खसरा अलग है।

questions.original_question: A cube of side 49 cm is painted purple on all the faces and then cut into smaller cubes of sides 7 cm each. Find the number of smaller cubes having only one face printed.

english.explanation: The cube is divided into 7 smaller cubes per side (49/7 = 7). Cubes with one face painted are on the faces but not edges. Each face has (7-2)^2 = 25 such cubes. Total for 6 faces: 6 * 25 = 150.

hindi.explanation: 49 सेमी भुजा वाला घन 7 सेमी भुजा वाले 7x7x7=343 छोटे घनों में काटा गया है। केवल एक फलक रंगे घनों की संख्या = 6 फलकों पर (7-2)² = 25 प्रत्येक फलक पर, कुल 6x25=150।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given figure when the mirror is placed at &#39;AB&#39; as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Savita_SSC_22-6-22_D38.png" style="width: 98px; height: 132px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image along AB reverses the figure horizontally. The correct option reflects the original figure's asymmetrical elements (e.g., arrows or shapes) in reverse order.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब में आकृति AB रेखा के सापेक्ष उल्टी दिखाई देती है। पहला विकल्प सही दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब प्रदर्शित करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>CAF, HEJ, SIQ, XMU, CQF, ?</p>

english.explanation: The sequence follows a pattern where each letter-cluster's letters increase by +5, +4, +7 cyclically. For the first letters: C(3) +5=H(8), H+11=S(19), S+5=X(24), X-21=C(3), C+11=M(13). Second letters: A(1)+4=E(5), E+4=I(9), I+4=M(13), M+4=Q(17), Q+4=U(21). Third letters: F(6)+4=J(10), J+7=Q(17), Q+4=U(21), U+7= B(2), B+4=F(6). The next cluster is MUJ.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में प्रत्येक अक्षर दाएं ओर 4 स्थान बढ़ता है। C→H→M, A→E→I→M→Q, F→J→O→T→X→B→F, इत्यादि। अगला अक्षर समूह MUJ है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and make the given equation correct.</p>

<p>88 * 120 * 42 * 240 * 48 * 2</p>

english.explanation: Substitute the operators: 88 × 120 = 10,560. 10,560 ÷ 42 = 251.42. 251.42 − 240 = 11.42. 11.42 = 48 − 2 = 46. The correct sequence balances the equation as 88 × 120 ÷ 42 − 240 = 48 − 2.
The logical order is: Virus (3) causes Infection (5), leading to Symptoms (4). Treatment (1) follows, resulting in Recovery (2).

hindi.explanation: तार्किक क्रम: वायरस → संक्रमण → लक्षण → उपचार → स्वास्थ्य-लाभ।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark(?) in the following series.</p>

<p>61, 99, 152, 222, 312, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series increases by 38, 53, 70, 90, and the next difference is +90+10=100. 312 + 100 = 412.

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;ONION&#39; is coded as 201 and &#39;POTATO&#39; is coded as 261. How will &#39;MANGO&#39; be coded in that language?

<p>Select the option that is related to the third letter-cluster in the same way as the second letter-cluster is related to the first letter cluster.</p>

<p>RJB : TGF :: QPG : ?</p>

english.explanation: RJB → TGF: R+2=T, J+3=G, B+5=F. QPG → ? Q+2=S, P+3=M, G+5=K. Result: SMK.

questions.original_question: &#39;Ummatt-aat&#39; is a folk dance form performed in _______.

english.explanation: 'Ummatt-aat' is a traditional folk dance of the Kodava community in Coorg (Karnataka). The other options (Itanagar, Kasauli, Gangtok) are regions with different cultural traditions and do not associate with this dance form.

hindi.explanation: उम्मट-आट एक लोक नृत्य है जो कूर्ग (कर्नाटक) में किया जाता है। यह नृत्य विशेष रूप से कर्नाटक के कूर्ग जिले के लोगों द्वारा प्रसिद्ध है। अन्य विकल्प भारत के अलग-अलग राज्यों के शहर हैं जो इस नृत्य से जुड़े नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: What is the projected growth rate of Gross Domestic Product (GDP) for India in 2021 as given by the international Monetary Fund (IMF) in April 2021?

english.explanation: The IMF projected India's GDP growth rate for 2021 as 12.5% in April 2021, reflecting economic recovery post-pandemic. Other options (10.2%, 11.6%, 13.7%) were either projections for other years or incorrect estimates.

hindi.explanation: अंतर्राष्ट्रीय मुद्रा कोष (IMF) ने अप्रैल 2021 में भारत के लिए 2021 में सकल घरेलू उत्पाद (GDP) की अनुमानित वृद्धि दर 12.5% घोषित की। अन्य विकल्प प्रतिशत दरों हैं जो IMF के अनुमान से असंगत हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is an Indian &#39;not for profit&#39; organisation, working on sustainable solutions to make sanitation and water accessible to all?

english.explanation: Sulabh International is a non-profit organization renowned for providing sustainable sanitation and water solutions. Goonj focuses on clothing, Pratham on education, and Helpage India on elderly care.

hindi.explanation: सुलभ इंटरनेशनल एक भारतीय गैर-लाभकारी संगठन है जो स्वच्छता और जल पहुंच सुनिश्चित करने के लिए काम कर रहा है। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग संगठनों के नाम हैं जो इस उद्देश्य से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: ______ is defined as the temperature to which the air would have to cool (at constant pressure and constant water vapour content) in order to reach saturation.

english.explanation: Dew point temperature is the temperature at which air becomes saturated with moisture. Surface and air temperatures are distinct, while relative humidity measures moisture content as a percentage of saturation.

hindi.explanation: ओस बिंदु तापमान वह तापमान है जिस पर वायु संतृप्त हो जाती है। यह वायु के तापमान के बराबर नहीं होता, बल्कि वायु के ठंडा होने पर अब जल वाष्प के संतृप्त होने का बिंदु है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे सतह तापमान या सापेक्षिक आर्द्रता इस परिभाषा को संतुष्ट नहीं करते।

questions.original_question: Who became the first player to hit 350 sixes during IPL 2021?

english.explanation: Chris Gayle became the first player to hit 350 sixes in IPL 2021. Other players like Rohit Sharma and AB de Villiers are notable, but Gayle achieved this milestone first.

hindi.explanation: IPL 2021 में 350 छक्के लगाने वाले पहले खिलाड़ी क्रिस गेल रहे। अन्य विकल्पों में रोहित शर्मा और एबी डि विलियर्स शामिल हैं, लेकिन उन्होंने इस उपलब्धि को हासिल नहीं किया।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a book written by Avni Doshi?

english.explanation: 'Burnt Sugar' is the debut novel by Avni Doshi, which won the Booker Prize. The other books are by Jhumpa Lahiri (Unaccustomed Earth, Interpreter of Maladies) and Rita Levi-Montalcini (In Other Words).

hindi.explanation: अवनी दोशी द्वारा लिखित पुस्तक 'बर्न्ट शुगर' है। अन्य विकल्प अन्य लेखकों द्वारा लिखित पुस्तकें हैं।

questions.original_question: India banned unregulated deposit schemes through an Act passed in the year ______.

english.explanation: India banned unregulated deposit schemes through the Chit Funds (Amendment) Act in 2018. This act aimed to curb fraudulent financial activities and protect investors.

hindi.explanation: भारत ने 2018 में अनियमित जमा योजनाओं पर प्रतिबंध लगा दिया। 2019 और 2016 के विकल्प गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: As per Economic Survey 2020-21, India entered the top 50 innovation countries for the first time in ____ since the inception of the Global Innovation Index in 2007.

english.explanation: India entered the top 50 in the Global Innovation Index for the first time in 2019. The index tracks innovation inputs and outputs globally.

hindi.explanation: भारत ने 2020 में पहली बार शीर्ष 50 नवाचार देशों में प्रवेश किया। अन्य विकल्प दिए गए वर्षों में इस सूची में शामिल नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: <p>The salinity of ocean waters is calculated as the amount of salt (in gm) dissolved in _____ gm of seawater.</p>

english.explanation: Ocean salinity is measured as grams of salt per 1,000 grams of seawater. This standard metric is used universally for consistency in scientific studies.

hindi.explanation: समुद्र के पानी की लवणता 1000 ग्राम समुद्री जल में घुले नमक की मात्रा के रूप में गणना की जाती है। 100 या 10 के विकल्प गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years did the resolution at the Karachi Session of the Indian National Congress dwell on how Independent India&#39;s Constitution should look?

english.explanation: The 1931 Karachi Session of the Indian National Congress passed a resolution outlining the structure of India's future Constitution. Other years refer to different sessions or historical events.

hindi.explanation: 1928 के कराची अधिवेशन में भारतीय राष्ट्रीय कांग्रेस ने स्वतंत्र भारत के संविधान के प्रस्ताव को रखा। 1931 और 1946 के विकल्प गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was named Wisden Almanack&#39;s ODI player of the 2010s in April 2021?

english.explanation: MS Dhoni was named Wisden Almanack's ODI Player of the 2010s for his consistent performance and leadership. Other players like Virat Kohli and Sachin Tendulkar were also prominent but not selected for this specific accolade.

hindi.explanation: 2010 के दशक में विजडन अल्मनैक द्वारा एकदिवसीय खिलाड़ी के रूप में विराट कोहली चुने गए। अन्य विकल्प अन्य क्रिकेटर्स हैं जो इस उपलब्धि के योग्य नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following defeated Harshavardhana when he invaded the Chalukya kingdom in the Deccan?

english.explanation: Pulakesin II, the Chalukya ruler, defeated Harshavardhana when he invaded the Deccan. This historical event is noted in ancient Indian history texts.

hindi.explanation: हर्षवर्धन द्वारा दक्कन के चालुक्य साम्राज्य पर आक्रमण को पुलकेशिन द्वितीय ने पराजित किया। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग राजाओं के नाम हैं जो इस घटना से जुड़े नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following Indian wrestlers became World No. 1 in 65-kg freestyle wrestling in March 2021?

english.explanation: Bajrang Punia became the World No. 1 in 65-kg freestyle wrestling in March 2021. Wrestlers like Pawan Kumar and Yogeshwar Dutt are also notable but did not achieve this ranking at that time.

hindi.explanation: मार्च 2021 में बजरंग पुनिया 65 किग्रा फ्रीस्टाइल कुश्ती में विश्व के नंबर 1 पहलवान बन गए। अन्य विकल्प अन्य पहलवानों के नाम हैं जो इस उपलब्धि के योग्य नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Under the Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM), what is the target year to provide Functional Household Tap Connection (FHTC) to every rural household in India?

english.explanation: The Jal Jeevan Mission aims to provide tap connections to all rural households by 2024. The target year reflects the government's long-term infrastructure goals.

hindi.explanation: जल जीवन मिशन के तहत प्रत्येक ग्रामीण परिवार को कार्यात्मक घरेलू नल कनेक्शन प्रदान करने का लक्ष्य 2024 है। 2023 और 2025 के विकल्प गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: In which of the following towns will you find the &#39;Kachari Ruins&#39;?

english.explanation: The 'Kachari Ruins' are located in Gangtok, Sikkim. These ancient structures are remnants of the Kamarupa and Kachari kingdoms.

hindi.explanation: कछारी खंडहर दीमापुर (नागालैंड) में पाए जाते हैं। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग शहरों के नाम हैं जो इससे संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following animals has more than one heart?

english.explanation: The octopus has three hearts: two pump blood to the gills, and one pumps it to the rest of the body. The other animals listed (porcupine, chameleon, tortoise) are vertebrates with a single heart.

hindi.explanation: ऑक्टोपस में तीन हृदय होते हैं: दो हृदय गिल्स में रक्त पहुंचाते हैं और एक हृदय शरीर के अन्य हिस्सों में रक्त पहुंचाता है। इसके अलावा, जब ऑक्टोपस तैरता है, तो गिल्स के हृदय बंद हो जाते हैं और केवल एक ही हृदय काम करता है। अन्य जानवरों जैसे सेही, गिरगिट और कछुआ में केवल एक हृदय होता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a characteristic of fibres in relation to plant anatomy?

options.value: Responsible for conduction and also mechanical support

english.correct_answer: 3. Responsible for conduction and also mechanical support
english.explanation: Plant fibers are specialized cells in vascular tissues that provide both structural support and facilitate the transport of water and nutrients. Options 1 (shorted cells) and 4 (oblique end walls) are incorrect. Option 2 refers to vessel elements, not fibers.

hindi.explanation: पादप तंतु (fibers) में लेग्निन से भरपूर गर्तित मोटाई होती है, जो यांत्रिक समर्थन प्रदान करती है। तंतु कोशिकाएं लंबी, पतली और मजबूत होती हैं, जबकि विकास ऊतक (collenchyma) चालन और समर्थन दोनों का कार्य करता है। विकल्प 3 में दिए गए चालन का विवरण तंतु के लिए नहीं है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the President of Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industries (FICCI) as of April 2021?

english.explanation: Deepak Parekh served as the President of FICCI from April 2020 to March 2021. The other options are either incorrect or not associated with this role during the specified timeframe.

hindi.explanation: 2021 में फेडरेशन ऑफ इंडियन चैंबर्स ऑफ कॉमर्स एंड इंडस्ट्रीज (FICCI) के अध्यक्ष उदय शंकर बने। अन्य विकल्पों में राकेश मखीजा, दीपक पारेख और गिरीश चंद्र चतुर्वेदी अलग-अलग समय अध्यक्ष रहे हैं।

questions.original_question: The 60<sup>th</sup>&nbsp;Amendment to the Constitution of India increased the ceiling of profession tax from Rs. 250 p.a. to ____ p.a.

english.explanation: The 60th Amendment to the Indian Constitution increased the annual profession tax ceiling from ₹250 to ₹2,500 to adjust for economic changes and inflation.

hindi.explanation: 60वें संविधान संशोधन अधिनियम, 1988 ने व्यवसाय कर की सीमा को 250 रुपये से बढ़ाकर 2,500 रुपये प्रति वर्ष कर दिया। यह आयकर नियमों को अपडेट करने का उद्देश्य था।

questions.original_question: The _____ is the extended margin of each continent occupied by relatively shallow seas and gulfs.

english.explanation: The continental shelf is the shallow, extended margin of each continent, where the seafloor is close to the landmass. The continental slope and deep sea plain are deeper regions, while oceanic deeps are trenches.

hindi.explanation: महाद्वीपीय शेल्फ पानी के नीचे स्थित एक विस्तारित समतल क्षेत्र है, जो महाद्वीपीय महाद्वीप और गहरे समुद्री क्षेत्र के बीच संयोजक है। यह समुद्री उथलपुथल के लिए जिम्मेदार है।

questions.original_question: _______ is one of the languages in which the denomination is printed on the reverse of a contemporary Indian currency note.

english.explanation: Dzongkha, the national language of Bhutan, is printed on the reverse of Indian currency notes to reflect India's friendly ties with neighboring countries. Other languages like Nepali and Sinhala are also included but not listed here.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय मुद्रा नोट के पीछे नेपाली भाषा में मूल्य अंकित होता है। अन्य विकल्पों में बर्मी, सिंहली और जोंगखा भाषाएं निर्दिष्ट की गई हैं, लेकिन ये मुद्राओं पर अंकित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: In which of the following Indian states will you find the Netarhat Mountains, also called &#39;Queen of Chotanagpur&#39;?

english.explanation: The Netarhat Mountains, part of the Chotanagpur plateau, are located in Jharkhand and are known as the 'Queen of Chotanagpur' for their scenic beauty and elevation.

hindi.explanation: नेतरहाट पर्वत झारखंड राज्य में स्थित है, जिसे 'छोटानागपुर की रानी' के नाम से जाना जाता है। यह एलवाया पहाड़ियों का हिस्सा है। अन्य विकल्पों में छत्तीसगढ़, ओडिशा और पश्चिम बंगाल इसके लिए गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following legislations ought to allow senior Indian magistrates to preside over cases involving British subjects in India?

english.explanation: The Ilbert Bill of 1884 aimed to allow Indian magistrates to try British subjects in criminal cases, which sparked protests due to colonial resistance. The other options refer to unrelated laws.

hindi.explanation: इल्बर्ट बिल, 1884 भारतीय न्यायाधीशों को ब्रिटिश विषयों को सुनने की अनुमति देता था, जो उस समय एक विवादित मुद्दा था। अन्य विकल्पों में दिए गए अधिनियम संबंधित कार्य नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following freedom fighters hoisted the Indian flag at the Gowalia Tank Maidan in Mumbai during the Quit India Movement?

english.explanation: Aruna Asaf Ali hoisted the Indian flag at the Gowalia Tank Maidan in Mumbai during the Quit India Movement, becoming a symbol of resistance against British rule.

hindi.explanation: अरुणा आसफ अली ने 1942 में मुंबई के गोवालिया टैंक मैदान में भारतीय ध्वज फहराया, जो भारत छोड़ो आंदोलन के प्रमुख घटनाक्रमों में से एक था। अन्य स्वतंत्रता सेनानियां विकल्पों में दिए गए अन्य घटनाओं से जुड़ी हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following became the second state in the country to achieve 100% functional household tap connections (FHTCs)?

english.explanation: Telangana became the second state (after Sikkim) to achieve 100% functional household tap connections under the Jal Jeevan Mission, ensuring water accessibility for all households.

hindi.explanation: तेलंगाना 100% फंक्शनल होम टैप कनेक्शन (FHTCs) प्राप्त करने वाला दूसरा राज्य बना। पहला राज्य तमिलनाडु रहा है। सिक्किम, केरल और मिजोरम इसके लिए पात्र नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;2&radic;2x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;- 3&radic;3y<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;= (&radic;2x -&nbsp;&radic;3y)(Ax<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;- Bxy + Cy<sup>2</sup>), then the value of (A<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ B<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ C<sup>2</sup>) is:

english.explanation: The expression 2√2x³ - 3√3y³ can be factored as (√2x - √3y)(Ax² - Bxy + Cy²). Recognizing this as a difference of cubes: (√2x)³ - (√3y)³ = (√2x - √3y)(2x² + √6xy + 3y²). Comparing terms, A=2, B=√6 (but since the middle term is -Bxy, B=-√6), and C=3. Squaring these values: A²=4, B²=6, C²=9. Sum: 4+6+9=19.

questions.original_question: A train covers a distance of 225 km in&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(2\frac{1}{2} \)</span>&nbsp;hours at a uniform speed. The time taken by the train (in hours) to cover a distance of 630 km at the same speed is:

english.explanation: First, calculate the train's speed. The train covers 225 km in 2.5 hours (2 1/2 hours). Speed = Distance / Time = 225 km / 2.5 hours = 90 km/h. To find the time taken to cover 630 km at this speed, use Time = Distance / Speed = 630 km / 90 km/h = 7 hours. Thus, the correct answer is 7.
key_concepts: Conversion of mixed numbers to decimals (2 1/2 = 2.5)
Proportional reasoning in uniform speed problems

hindi.explanation: रेलगाड़ी की गति ज्ञात करने के लिए पहले दूरी और समय का उपयोग करें: $\frac{225}{2.5} = 90$ किमी/घंटा। अब 630 किमी दूरी के लिए समय ज्ञात करें: $\frac{630}{90} = 7$ घंटे।
key_concepts: दूरी, समय और गति के बीच संबंध

questions.original_question: From a point P on a level ground, the angle of elevation of the top of the tower is 30&deg;. If the distance of point P from the foot of the tower is 510 m, then 50% of the height of the tower (in m) is:

hindi.explanation: माना मीनार की ऊँचाई h मीटर है। बिंदु P से मीनार के शिखर का उन्नयन कोण 30° है और मीनार के पाद से बिंदु P की दूरी 510 मीटर है। समकोण त्रिभुज में, tan(30°) = h / 510। चूँकि tan(30°) = 1/√3, इसलिए 1/√3 = h / 510। इस समीकरण को हल करने पर h = 510 / √3 मीटर प्राप्त होता है। 50% ऊँचाई = (510 / √3) × 1/2 = 255 / √3 = (255√3)/3 = 85√3 मीटर (रू3 के हर का परिमेयकरण करके)। अतः सही उत्तर विकल्प 2 है।
key_concepts: उन्नयन कोण की परिभाषा और उपयोग

questions.original_question: Chords AB and CD of a circle intersect externally at P. If AB = 7 cm, CD = 1 cm and PD = 5 cm, then the length of PB (in cm) is:

english.explanation: When two chords intersect externally at a point P, the power of a point theorem states that PA * PB = PC * PD. For chord CD, PD = 5 cm and CD = 1 cm. If CD is extended beyond D to meet at P, then PC = PD + CD = 5 + 1 = 6 cm. Thus, PC * PD = 6 * 5 = 30. For chord AB (7 cm), let PA = x and PB = x + 7 (since AB = 7 cm). Setting PA * PB = 30 gives x(x + 7) = 30. Solving the quadratic equation x² + 7x - 30 = 0 yields x = 3 cm (PA). Therefore, PB = x + 7 = 10 cm.

hindi.explanation: जब वृत्त की जीवाएँ बाह्य रूप से प्रतिच्छेद करती हैं, तो वृत्त के बाहरी बिंदु से जीवाओं के खंडों के गुणनफल बराबर होते हैं। समीकरण है: PA × PB = PC × PD। माना कि PB = x, तब PA = PB + AB = x + 7। PC = PD + CD = 5 + 1 = 6। समीकरण से: (x + 7)x = 6 × 5 → x² + 7x - 30 = 0। हल करने पर x = 3 सेमी (ऋणात्मक मान अस्वीकृत कर दिया गया)। अतः PB = 3 सेमी।
key_concepts: वृत्त की जीवाएँ बाह्य रूप से प्रतिच्छेद करने पर गुणनफल का समीकरण
द्विघात समीकरण का उपयोग लंबाई की गणना करने के लिए

questions.original_question: P and Q start a shop with a capital of Rs. 1,50,000 and Rs. 4,50,000, respectively. After a year, out of the profit of Rs. 1,60,000, P gets his share of profit plus some money that is not a part of the profit, as his salary. If P gets a total of Rs.70,000, what is the salary (in Rs.) he received?

english.explanation: P and Q's investments are in the ratio of 1,50,000:4,50,000, which simplifies to 1:3. The total profit of Rs. 1,60,000 is divided in this ratio. P's share of the profit is (1/4)*1,60,000 = Rs. 40,000. Since P receives Rs. 70,000 in total, his salary is the difference between his total amount and his profit share: 70,000 - 40,000 = Rs. 30,000.
key_concepts: Profit sharing ratio based on capital investment
Calculating individual shares from total profit
Distinguishing between profit and additional salary
साझेदारी में लाभ-हानि के बराबर अनुपातों में बाँटा जाता है।
व्यक्तिगत लाभ की गणना निवेश के अनुपात पर आधारित होती है।
कुल प्राप्त धन में से लाभ के हिस्से को घटाने पर वेतन प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: If 5 sin&nbsp;&theta;&nbsp;&ndash; 4 cos&nbsp;&theta; = 0, 0&deg; &lt;&nbsp;&theta; &lt; 90&deg;, then the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{5sin\theta-cos\theta}{5sin\theta+3cos\theta} \)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: Given the equation 5 sinθ - 4 cosθ = 0, we rearrange it to 5 sinθ = 4 cosθ, leading to tanθ = 4/5. Using tanθ = opposite/adjacent = 4/5, we construct a right triangle with sides 4, 5, and hypotenuse √41. This gives sinθ = 4/√41 and cosθ = 5/√41. Substituting these into the expression (5 sinθ - cosθ)/(5 sinθ + 3 cosθ) simplifies to (15/√41)/(35/√41) = 3/7.

hindi.explanation: दिया गया समीकरण 5 sinθ - 4 cosθ = 0 है। इसे सरल करने पर, 5 tanθ = 4 प्राप्त होता है, अतः tanθ = 4/5। अब, sinθ = 4k और cosθ = 5k मानकर (जहाँ k स्थिरांक है) त्रिकोणमितीय पहचान sin²θ + cos²θ = 1 का उपयोग करके k का मान ज्ञात किया जाता है। k = 1/√41 प्राप्त होता है। इन मानों को व्यंजक में प्रतिस्थापित करने पर, अंश (15/√41) और हर (35/√41) प्राप्त होते हैं। इस प्रकार, व्यंजक का मान 15/35 = 3/7 होता है।
key_concepts: अनुपात निर्धारण द्वारा मान ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question: The value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{48.3\times[(4.95)^2+4.95\times13.25]}{[(12.55)^2-(5.65)^2]\times19.8} \)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: To solve the expression, first simplify the numerator and denominator separately. The numerator becomes 48.3 × 4.95 × (4.95 + 13.25) = 48.3 × 4.95 × 18.2. The denominator uses the difference of squares formula: (12.55² - 5.65²) × 19.8 = (6.9 × 18.2) × 19.8. After canceling the common 18.2 term, the expression simplifies to (48.3 × 4.95) / (6.9 × 19.8). Calculating this step-by-step gives 239.085 / 136.62 = 1.75.
english.key_concepts: Difference of squares, factoring, arithmetic simplification, decimal multiplication/division

A tyre has 3 punctures. The first puncture alone would have made the tyre flat in 9 minutes, the second alone would have done it in 18 minutes, the third alone would have done it in 6 minutes. If the air leaks out at a constant rate, then how long (in minutes) does it take for all the punctures together to make it flat?

<p>Rohan was pushed into the pool by Karan.</p>

options.value: Karan was pushing Rohan into the pool.
Karan pushed Rohan into the pool.
Rohan had pushed Karan into the pool.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct passive voice of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>She is making a beautiful beaded curtain.</p>

options.value: A beautiful beaded curtain was being made by her.
A beautiful beaded curtain is being made by her.
A beautiful beaded curtain is made by her.
A beautiful beaded curtain was made by her.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>The crew/ of sailors/ were not perturbed/ by the strong gale.</p>

<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>Sharpness and accuracy of judgment</p>
<strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

<p><strong>Select the correct indirect speech form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The teacher said, &quot;You must work hard for your exams.&quot;</p>

options.value: The teacher was telling her students to work hard for their exams.
The teacher told students for working hard for their exams.
The teacher advised her students to work hard for their exams.
The teacher was advising her students to do work hard for their exams.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>The manager said, &quot;Could you please / confirm me whether you / have received all the items / that you had ordered?&quot;</p>

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Negligent</p>

<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them may contain an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options. If you don&#39;t find any error, mark &#39;No error&#39; as your answer.</strong></p>

<p>My neighbour&#39;s grandson / is only / five month old.</p>
<strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Rectify</p>

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Hold the key</p>

options.value: To have the right of succession

questions.original_question:

<p>My friends succeeded because they <u>left no stone unturned</u> in the search for an answer to the problem.</p>

<p>Something that is strong and lasts a long time without breaking or becoming weaker.</p>
